name: Blue Dragon's Playground
description: This Rube Goldberg Machine was inspired by the cute dragons I found in the Unity Asset Store. I wanted my run through to be fun and go along with my small & lovely blue dragon. I created a C# script to make the music begin when the colored panels hit the floor. The ball pushes these rainbow panels to the first blue bar. I used hinge joints for the blue bar and the dragon. The egg-like ball continues on the bounce its way to the dragon, which then pushes another egg-like ball down the path to the ball brawl exit.
